website_summaries.verdict: Comfort and style collide with the men’s Active Expert Oxford Cleat from Hush Puppies. It is packed with technologies such as the BioBevel and BioTrax to ensure enjoyable all-day comfort. As most users claimed, they felt like walking on air. Crafted with durable material, the Hush Puppies Active Expert has a fashion-forward design that can effortlessly complement several casual ensembles. It is a worthy addition to one’s arsenal of comfy and stylish kicks.
pros: A lot of wearers have testified that the Hush Puppies Active Expert is a comfortable sneaker perfect for walking
This shoe has good quality leather as per several customers
Many purchasers are captivated of the sneaker’s stylish and beautiful design
Among the Hush Puppies sneakers, this  model provides lightweight feel as if walking on air according to some users
One has stated that this footwear requires no break-in period
Overall, the Hush Puppies Active Expert is considered as an excellent shoe by most of the reviewers
cons: Some people with wide feet have said that the Hush Puppies Active Expert fits a bit tight
Others have difficulties sliding their foot in
When it comes to length, the shoe runs big as per a few testers

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've bough Hush Puppies and won't be the last. This is great pair of shoes for the price. It's light weight, very comfortable and great quality. I would it buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Marilei Amurao-Tabile

customer_reviews.title: Good quality leather
customer_reviews.text: Good quality leather as it is expected from Hush Puppies. Runs too big, may be to compensate for the weird top of the shoe. Which brings me to the main point - it is kind-of hard to put these shoes on with the sock-like top.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Peter

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Really good fit. They feel like a good pair of sneakers. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Friday movie

customer_reviews.title: Tread wears out/charcoal colored when it’s supposed to be black.
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of the shoe (rubber sole?) wears out way too quickly. I ordered black but this shoe is more like charcoal colored.
customer_reviews.author: Lofasz

customer_reviews.title: My faulty pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: The pair of shoes that I received is defective, you can see a bad sticking on the edge of the sole of one of them. I attach images. Perhaps with daily use the sole comes off completely, very disappointed by this. I do not make the refund for being out of the USA and shipping is very expensive. Obviating this particular defect, the shoes are very comfortable, it feels very good when walking.
customer_reviews.author: R.J. Bernay

customer_reviews.title: Wide is not wide enough
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a wide and it still pinches my toes in the toe box. Wide should be wide.
customer_reviews.author: emptynesterinhky

customer_reviews.title: Who the hell would even design shoes like this?
customer_reviews.text: Almost impossible to get your feet into these shoes. Life is enough of a struggle without shoes that put up a fight when you want to wear them. Also run big.
customer_reviews.author: MNY

customer_reviews.title: Shoe has lasted less than 7 days
customer_reviews.text: Part of the shoe has come loose already, and I have had these shoes less than a week. It's a disgrace
customer_reviews.author: steven noble

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe, but a bear to get on
customer_reviews.text: I have some foot issues so finding the right pair of shoes is always at the top of my list. I've had zero issues with my feet since wearing these. That said, these things are a bear to get on. If you have back issues and can't bend over very far, don't bother, you'll never get them on. The sock liner makes it a struggle even under normal circumstances. Once on tho they shine. I was surprised how lightweight and durable they are and they look nice with almost any outfit. This is my second pair, but I bought them reluctantly given how difficult they are to put on - that's why they only got 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: mikef

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe. But narrow
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe really light and comftorble just a little bit narrow
customer_reviews.author: Eve Emanuel

product_meta.title: Hush Puppies Men's Active Expert Oxford Boot
product_meta.description: Durable. Classic. Effortlessly cool. Our Active Expert ankle boots are a lot like their name-expertly built for active movement. Crafted in smooth full grain leather, these men's boots are crafted with superior comfort technology. Not only does the climate control socklining keep your feet dry, the BioBevel beveled heel and toe encourage balanced motion for comfort with every step. Enjoy anatomical arch support from the cushioned footbed, which you can easily remove to adjust the fit.
feature_bullets: Dri-Lex soft mesh lining and socklining for climate control
Removable contour cushion footbed combines layers of memory foam and breathable PU foam, with molded EVA heel and anatomical arch support
Multi density molded EVA midsole proides ultimat cushioning and flexibilty. Molded rubber outsole provides excellent traction and durability
BioTrax: A deep "S" groove guides the foot forward while internal stabilizing zones support the foot encouraging natural movement
BioBevel: Beveled toe and heel encourage a balanced, natural walking motion to enjoy all day activity with ease
